Workshare | Front-end, Back-end | Fulltime | Barcelona / London | ONSITE | www.workshare.com

At Workshare we are in the process of opening offices in Barcelona to build a new team there to work in parallel with our offices in London.

We are looking for developers on both locations, with experience on React, Backbone, Elixir or Ruby to help us develop Transact (https://www.workshare.com/product/transact). Project that just started taking off. We offer competitive salaries which vary depending on the location and the possibility of working from home one day per week.

We are a team that cares about learning new things, the quality of our code, good practices, design and software architecture. We like to organize activities to encourage this culture in our developers.

Front-end: https://workshare.workable.com/jobs/536834 Back-end: https://workshare.workable.com/jobs/538378
